## WriterTool.write() method

Writes a named set to the disk in the format of the tool

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
write(tokens: TokenCollection): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokens | TokenCollection | tokens to write |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
